customARCS.name: Alliance for Research on Corporate Sustainability Metadata

ARCS1.name: 1) Were any of these data sets a) purchased, b) obtained through licensed databases, or c) provided by an organization under a nondisclosure or other agreement?

ARCS2.name: 2) If you responded Yes to Q1, have you ensured that sharing the data does not violate terms of the agreement? If you responded No to Q1, please enter N/A here.
ARCS2.description: Data sharing does not violate terms.

ARCS3.name: 3) Do any of these data sets include individual-level data (either collected or pre-existing in the dataset) that might make them subject to U.S. or international human subjects considerations?

ARCS4.name: 4) If you responded Yes to Q3, are these data sets totally de-identified or was sharing approved by your institutional review board ( IRB)? If you responded No to Q3 please enter N/A here.

ARCS5.name: 5) Do these datasets contain sensitive or personally identifiable private information? (Harvard Research Data Security Policy {www.security.harvard.edu/research-data-security-policy} may apply because this Dataverse is hosted by Harvard University.)
